node.html:
• Worked upon the implementation for technical showcases, the introduction of initiatives (such as the PEARLS portal & Human Library), and engaging the student community (through events like InHoTT, The Inter Hostel Technical Tournament & Gamescape).
  • Was responsible for bringing about technical solutions to solve campus problems. Coordinated with the Administration, the technical labs, and the technical clubs of NIT-T to develop a more conducive technical environment.
  • Currently working on an official chatbot for the Technical Council built using Rasa’s open-source conversational AI framework.

• Was responsible for managing all departmental activities and coordinated between the Students, the Department, and the Administration of the college.
  • Was the primary lead responsible for conducting Currents ‘21, an international level Science and Technology Symposium held in February. The symposium consisted of multiple technical events and guest lectures by prominent professionals.
  • Worked on the official Currents ’21 website website and handled the back-end for all technical events.

• Helped develop Google's Developer Student Club to enhance the technical community in NIT-Trichy.
  • Was responsible for organising multiple technical events, ML and Kotlin workshops, and Android Study Jams.
  • Worked on brand and identity development.

• Worked on improving the technical exposure for Tier-II and Tier-III colleges in the Trichy region to improve the community culture on campus.
  • Was responsible for conducting various technical events, workshops, and guest lectures.
  • Worked on social media content creation and brand development for different events under GirlScript, Trichy Chapter.

• Understood the open-source culture of software development.
  • Took part in various workshops and contributed to the open-source.
  • Gained insights into the contributions and development cycle of open-source softwares.

• Successfully conducted numerous campus development and social responsibility initiatives like Blood Donation Camps, Cloth Donation Drives, Tree Plantation Drives, Breast Cancer Screening, etc., on behalf of NCC in the college.
  • Was the Lead Manager responsible for Lakshya '19, held during March 2019, which included intriguing guest lectures, events, and workshops.
  • Headed the WebOps team for Lakshya '19. Was the manager of the project and contributed at various stages during its development to build the official website for Lakshya '19.
